definitions: in a manner intended to defend or protect

examples.text: both countries say they acted defensively when they sent troops in

shortDefinitions: used or intended to defend or protect

definitions: in a way that relates to the defending of a goal against the opposition in sports

examples.text: a complete player both offensively and defensively

shortDefinitions: in way that relates to defending of goal or wicket

definitions: in a way intended to challenge or avoid criticism

examples.text: he reacted defensively to attacks from fellow critics
CEOs have responded defensively to the onslaught on their profession

shortDefinitions: in way intended to challenge or avoid criticism
